title: (x) MCFCU sloped soft semiserif - Mirarae {Adriano S}
content:
Anyone know this font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152605im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Untitled-1_5235.jpg)

Thanks,  
Jeremy

 [‹ In desperate need of identifying script "C" used for a baseball team](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38452 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Haines & Associates classic serif caps - Classic Caps {Bart H} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38447 "Go to next forum topic")
author: adpressinc

comments.content: Can’t tell exactly with the rendering, but it could be [Mirarae](http://web.archive.org/web/20080705152605/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/mirarae/).
